org.omnaest.utils.spring.scope
Interface BeanScopeThreadContextManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
TrailingBeanIdentifierPatternBeanScope.TrailingBeanIdentifierPatternBeanScopeThreadContextManager
public interface BeanScopeThreadContextManager

A BeanScopeThreadContextManager allows to add and remove Threads to or from a spring bean Scope.

Author:
Omnaest
See Also:
Scope

Method Summary
 void addCurrentThreadToBeanScope()
          Adds the method calling Thread to the bean scope managed by this BeanScopeThreadContextManager
 void removeCurrentThreadFromBeanScope()
          Removes the method calling Thread to the bean scope managed by this BeanScopeThreadContextManager
 

Method Detail
